casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hogan, Appellant.
Submitted April 23, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Melvin Dildine, Assistant Defender, and Yincent J. Ziecardi, Acting Defender, for appellant.
Mark Sendrow, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 2, 1970:
